users.title: WHY USE REACT?
users.textcontent:
Speed
React simply enables developers to use particular components of their application on both the client-side and the server-side, resulting in a faster development process.

Reusable Components
React is incredibly adaptable. Once you’ve mastered it, you may use it to create high-quality user interfaces on a variety of platforms.

 React has a larger community behind it
One of the most compelling reasons to use React JS in your project is the extensive community support it has.

React is easy to test.
ReactJS applications are super easy to test.
Virtual DOM

React builds an in-memory data structure cache that calculates the changes and then updates the browser.

users.title: HTML
users.textcontent: HTML stands for Hyper Text Markup Language · HTML is the standard markup language for creating Web pages ·

users.title: CSS
users.textcontent: CSS stands for Cascading Style Sheets · CSS describes how HTML elements are to be displayed on screen, paper, or in other media ·

users.title: What is Bootstrap
users.textcontent: Bootstrap is the most popular CSS Framework for developing responsive and mobile-first websites.

users.title: jQuery
users.textcontent: jQuery is a fast, small, and feature-rich JavaScript library. It makes things like HTML document traversal and manipulation, event handling, animation, and Ajax much simpler with an easy-to-use API that works across a multitude of browsers.
